**Solution**:

Set $\mat{X}_{n\times 3}=[\; \vec{1} \; \; \vec{t} \; \; \vec{t}^2 \; ]$ with $\vec{1}=(1,\dots,1)$, $\vect{t}=(t_1,\dots,t_n)$ and $\vec{t}^2=(t_1^2,\dots,t_n^2)$.
Then, set $\vec{\beta}=(\beta_0,\beta_1,\beta_2)$ in the notation of Question 1.
